ygData.subject: Re: Guild?
ygData.msgSnippet: 4  Briei and Briek in Felwithie and Freeport. Just post when you ll be on. I need to get back to playing that bard a bit, never played one before so it s an
ygData.messageBody:
4 <G> Briei and Briek in Felwithie and Freeport. Just post when you'll
be on.

I need to get back to playing that bard a bit, never played one before
so it's an experience. <g>

Brie =)

Lora Roa wrote:
>
> From: Lora Roa <loraroa@...>
>
> What home town did you start in? And what times are you likely to be on?
>
> Here are three character that can add
> Luna (leader - never know where she'll be)
> Ysabel (Qeynos area)
> Taizu (Freeport area)
>
> Luna certainly knows more. She's on a lot, and I work from home many days
> and if I have a time/place to meet in the game prearranged can usually meet
> at almost anytime. (Just can't stay to hunt if its during my working
> hours). ;)
>
> - Lora
> Taizu/Shiri/Deceit/Ysabel on Brell
>
> At 06:58 PM 8/23/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: "MJ Solomon" <mjsol@...>
> >
> >I made a character on Brell. I was hoping to hook up with the guild, but I
> >didn't see anyone on. How do I join up?
